sect1.title: "Out of the Box" JavaStation Boot File Solutions
sect1.para: This chapter is for administrators who have neither the time nor energy to put together files as described in the previous two chapters, or just want to see Linux on a JavaStation rapidly. In this chapter are complete kernel+embedded-root-fs solutions for to try.
The images here perform simple (or meaningless) tasks, but are useful for verifying a server configuration. Configuring the boot server is covered in the next chapter.

sect2.title: Simple Solution #1
sect2.para: This is simple solution #1, or at least it will be when it gets created. Right now this section is a stub for the future files.
